thread.title: Marquis Who's Who Honors Mihai Lehene for Expertise in Nonprofit Management
thread.title_full: Marquis Who's Who Honors Mihai Lehene for Expertise in Nonprofit Management

title: Marquis Who's Who Honors Mihai Lehene for Expertise in Nonprofit Management
text:
June 12, 2025
GLENVIEW, IL, June 12, 2025 /24-7PressRelease/ -- Mihai Lehene has been selected for inclusion in Marquis Who's Who. As in all Marquis Who's Who biographical volumes, individuals profiled are selected on the basis of current reference value. Factors such as position, noteworthy accomplishments, visibility, and prominence in a field are all taken into account during the selection process.
Mr. Lehene is a distinguished figure in nonprofit management and community building, recognized for his significant contributions to society through the Romanian United Foundation. As the founder and president of this organization, he has demonstrated exceptional leadership and dedication to fostering community development and support since 2019. His most notable achievement is establishing the foundation from scratch, which has made a meaningful impact on society.
In addition to his work with the Romanian United Foundation, Mr. Lehene has an extensive career in various industries. Since 2010, he has been the founder and owner of MDL Investments LLC, where he has applied his expertise in investment strategies. Before this role, he served as a managing partner at Allston Trading from 2007 to 2022, where he honed his skills in trading and financial management. His career began as a research assistant at the University of Illinois at Chicago from 2003 to 2004, followed by a position as a software analyst at Bank of America from 2004 to 2007.
Mr. Lehene's professional journey includes roles such as honorary advisor to the Romanian Minister for Research, Innovation and Digitalization since 2023, and an algorithmic trader at Jump Trading LLC from 2020 to 2021. His involvement with Keiretsu Forum Midwest since 2016 further underscores his commitment to industry engagement and innovation.
Mr. Lehene holds a Master of Science in computer science from the University of Illinois, Chicago, earned in 2004, and a Bachelor of Science in international business from The Academy of Economic Studies of Bucharest, completed in 2001. These academic achievements have been instrumental in shaping his career path and success. He attributes his accomplishments to a combination of luck, mentorship and inspiration, often finding that setbacks lead him to new opportunities.
Beyond his professional endeavors, Mr. Lehene has been recognized for his early achievements in computer science with national awards from the National Computer Science Olympiad in 1995, 1996 and 1997. These accolades highlight his longstanding dedication to excellence and innovation.
In his personal life, Mr. Lehene has a fulfilling family life with his wife, Claudia, and their two children. His family provides him with support and inspiration as he continues to progress in his professional and personal pursuits.
About Marquis Who's Who®:
Since 1899, when A. N. Marquis printed the First Edition of Who's Who in America®, Marquis Who's Who® has chronicled the lives of the most accomplished individuals and innovators from every significant field of endeavor, including politics, business, medicine, law, education, art, religion and entertainment. Who's Who in America® remains an essential biographical source for thousands of researchers, journalists, librarians and executive search firms around the world. The suite of Marquis® publications can be viewed at the official Marquis Who's Who® website, www.marquiswhoswho.com.
